name: Avani P. Gajallewar
position: Final Year IIIT-NR || PUF DESIGN || GATE(ECE) AIR 1218 || Front End Developer || Kaggle Contributor
about: Passionate Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE) student at IIIT Naya Raipur with a strong interdisciplinary focus bridging hardware systems, VLSI design, and AI-driven software solutions. My experience spans spintronics-based hardware security (PUFs), antenna optimization, and CAD/EDA simulations, alongside deep learning applications in medical imaging and LLM-powered hardware verification automation. With a GATE (ECE) qualification (AIR-1218) and hands-on projects in ResNet(2+1)D-based brain tumor classification, Verilog-to-testbench automation using Transformers, and CST-driven RF optimization, I bring expertise in both circuit-level innovation and AI-driven computational modeling. Skilled in Verilog, Python, C++, TensorFlow, and Cadence Virtuoso, I am passionate about building solutions at the intersection of electronics, computer science, and machine intelligence to advance healthcare, hardware security, and next-gen communication systems.

current_company.name: IIIT-Naya Raipur
current_company.title: Final Year IIIT-NR || PUF DESIGN || GATE(ECE) AIR 1218 || Front End Developer || Kaggle Contributor

experience.title: VLSI Design Engineer Intern
experience.description:
As a VLSI Design Engineer Intern, I worked on advanced hardware security primitives, focusing on the design and implementation of Physically Unclonable Functions (PUFs) using emerging spintronics technology. My primary design and simulation work was carried out using Cadence Virtuoso, where I developed transistor-level schematics and verified performance across various process, voltage, and temperature corners.

This internship provided me with hands-on experience in Integrating PUF structures into VLSI designs for cryptographic applications and exploring the potential of spintronics emerging technologies in secure hardware design.
experience.description_html:
As a VLSI Design Engineer Intern, I worked on advanced hardware security primitives, focusing on the design and implementation of Physically Unclonable Functions (PUFs) using emerging spintronics technology. My primary design and simulation work was carried out using Cadence Virtuoso, where I developed transistor-level schematics and verified performance across various process, voltage, and temperature corners.
This internship provided me with hands-on experience in Integrating PUF structures into VLSI designs for cryptographic applications and exploring the potential of spintronics emerging technologies in secure hardware design.

experience.title: Information Technology Network Specialist
experience.description:
As an IT Specialist Trainee, I had the opportunity to work closely under the guidance of experienced IT professionals, gaining hands-on experience and foundational knowledge in enterprise-level networking. My training focused on understanding the routing and distribution of network infrastructure within corporate environments.

Throughout the program, I studied how data flows through networks, the configuration and management of routers and switches, and the design of efficient network topologies. I also gained insight into best practices for maintaining network performance, security, and reliability in organizational settings.

This experience strengthened my technical foundation and prepared me for future roles in network administration and IT support, where structured planning and critical thinking are essential.
experience.description_html:
As an IT Specialist Trainee, I had the opportunity to work closely under the guidance of experienced IT professionals, gaining hands-on experience and foundational knowledge in enterprise-level networking. My training focused on understanding the routing and distribution of network infrastructure within corporate environments.
Throughout the program, I studied how data flows through networks, the configuration and management of routers and switches, and the design of efficient network topologies. This experience strengthened my technical foundation and prepared me for future roles in network administration and IT support, where structured planning and critical thinking are essential.

projects.title: RTL Implementation of 1X3 Router
projects.description: A 1x3 router is a digital circuit that receives data from a single input port and routes it to one of three output ports based on control signals. The router is designed using Register Transfer Level (RTL) coding in Verilog and follows a Finite State Machine (FSM) for efficient data flow management.

projects.title: Applicant Tracking System: Resume Analysis
projects.description: Efficient talent acquisition is critical for firms to succeed in today's changing employment market. The difficulty of finding the proper talent to hire grows along with the volume of applicants. Curriculum-Vitae (CV) or Resume screening is a cumbersome process in which an organization or firm examines a job applicantâ€™s CV for recruitment. Numerous applicants with diverse skills and limited and conventional ways of candidate hiring make the resume screening process more labor-intensive and tedious. Thus, automating the hiring process is the need of the hour to strengthen efficiency and accuracy while segregating the most appropriate resume. To streamline the recruitment procedure, machine learning techniques can be applied to create a model that aids the recruiters in sorting out the most qualified candidates by extracting the most valuable insights from the heap of resumes accumulated.

projects.title: House Price Prediction using Machine Learning
projects.description: The House Price Prediction Model is an AIML project based on machine learning operations. It sorts the given data of house prices based on customer's requirements such as land area, facilities available, location, etc. We have provided some expected results in an Excel workbook and compared them with our local market conditions. Our house price prediction model is a critical element of our team. It provides customers with an accurate and comprehensive outlook regarding the market trends, such as pricing, inventory, and sales. Our customers can use this service to calculate the overall cost of their house at the time of purchase.
